verses.verse: This is a true <S%G4103><s%> saying, <S%G3056><s%> If a man <S%G1536><s%> desire <S%G3713><s%> the office of a bishop, <S%G1984><s%> he desireth <S%G1937><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> work. <S%G2041><s%>

A bishop <S%G1985><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be <S%G1511><s%> blameless, <S%G423><s%> the husband <S%G435><s%> of one <S%G3391><s%> wife, <S%G1135><s%> vigilant, <S%G3524><s%> sober, <S%G4998><s%> of good behavior, <S%G2887><s%> given to hospitality, <S%G5382><s%> apt to teach; <S%G1317><s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> given to wine, <S%G3943><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> striker, <S%G4131><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> greedy of filthy lucre; <S%G146><s%> but <S%G235><s%> patient, <S%G1933><s%> not a brawler, <S%G269><s%> not covetous; <S%G866><s%>

One that ruleth <S%G4291><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> house, <S%G3624><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> his children <S%G5043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> subjection <S%G5292><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> gravity; <S%G4587><s%>

(For <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> how to rule <S%G4291><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> house, <S%G3624><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> shall he take care of <S%G1959><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%> of God?) <S%G2316><s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> a novice, <S%G3504><s%> lest <S%G3363><s%> being lifted up with pride <S%G5187><s%> he fall <S%G1706><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the condemnation <S%G2917><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> devil. <S%G1228><s%>

Moreover <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> report <S%G3141><s%> of <S%G575><s%> them which are without; <S%G1855><s%> lest <S%G3363><s%> he fall <S%G1706><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> reproach <S%G3680><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the snare <S%G3803><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> devil. <S%G1228><s%>

Likewise <S%G5615><s%> must the deacons <S%G1249><s%> be grave, <S%G4586><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> doubletongued, <S%G1351><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> given <S%G4337><s%> to much <S%G4183><s%> wine, <S%G3631><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> greedy of filthy lucre; <S%G146><s%>
Holding <S%G2192><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a pure <S%G2513><s%> conscience. <S%G4893><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> let these <S%G3778><s%> also <S%G1161><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> be proved; <S%G1381><s%> then <S%G1534><s%> let them use the office of a deacon, <S%G1247><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> found blameless. <S%G410><s%>

Even so <S%G5615><s%> must their wives <S%G1135><s%> be grave, <S%G4586><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> slanderers, <S%G1228><s%> sober, <S%G3524><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things. <S%G3956><s%>

Let the deacons <S%G1249><s%> be <S%G2077><s%> the husbands <S%G435><s%> of one <S%G3391><s%> wife, <S%G1135><s%> ruling <S%G4291><s%> their children <S%G5043><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their own <S%G2398><s%> houses <S%G3624><s%> well. <S%G2573><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> they that have used the office of a deacon <S%G1247><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> purchase <S%G4046><s%> to themselves <S%G1438><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> degree, <S%G898><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> boldness <S%G3954><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
These things <S%G5023><s%> write <S%G1125><s%> I unto thee, <S%G4671><s%> hoping <S%G1679><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> shortly: <S%G5032><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> I tarry long, <S%G1019><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> thou mayest know <S%G1492><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> thou oughtest <S%G1163><s%> to behave thyself <S%G390><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%> of the living <S%G2198><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the pillar <S%G4769><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ground <S%G1477><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> truth. <S%G225><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> without controversy <S%G3672><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mystery <S%G3466><s%> of godliness: <S%G2150><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> was manifest <S%G5319><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> justified <S%G1344><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> seen <S%G3700><s%> of angels, <S%G32><s%> preached <S%G2784><s%> unto <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> believed on <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> received up <S%G353><s%> into <S%G1722><s%> glory. <S%G1391><s%>
